forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. South southeast wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. South wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the moonlight lingers softly over Downtown San Francisco, you find yourself wrapped in a gentle chill typical of this time of year. The night sky is shrouded in clouds, hinting at the rain to come, yet the air carries a warmth, as if the melting frost of winter is yet to fully assert its grip on the city. You might notice the faintest shimmer of moisture settled delicately on the streets below, a prelude to the wetness that might grace the day ahead.

Tomorrow unfurls with more clouds than sunlight, carrying a promise of rain which could arrive gently, like a sigh from the heavens. Daylight may be dreary, yet there’s a certain beauty in the muted tones that will descend upon the city. With temperatures hovering around the mid-fifties, it’s wise to don layers—perhaps a cozy sweater underneath a waterproof jacket, ready for the unexpected puddles that will gather. A gentle breeze will whisper through the streets, but it’s unlikely to trouble your stroll if you’re wrapped warmly. 

Consider a quiet day spent drifting through an art gallery or savoring a steamy cup of coffee in a nook of your favorite café, watching the city embrace the rain. The flickering streetlights will create a dreamy ambiance, inviting introspective moments and perhaps a chance to lose yourself in a book, accompanied by the rhythmic sound of raindrops pattering against the window. Seek solace in the simple pleasures offered by this wet yet tranquil day, as San Francisco dons a veil of clouds and contemplation.
